<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Defy the Darkness](/Feats.aspx?ID=1399) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 42 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415)

</column>

---

Using ancient dwarven methods developed to fight enemies wielding magical darkness, you've honed your darkvision and sworn not to use such magic yourself. You gain [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), enabling you to see through magical darkness even if it normally hampers darkvision (such as the darkness created by a 4th-level [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) spell). You can't cast spells with the [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) trait, use item activations with the darkness trait, or use any other ability with the darkness trait.
name: Defy the Darkness
